items.title: New York AG Letitia James indicted for alleged fraud following pressure from Trump
items.description: New York Attorney General Letitia James has been indicted on at least one count of alleged fraud following pressure from President Donald Trump.

items.title: WATCH:  Crypto scam almost costs woman her life savings
items.description: The FBI says scams perpetrated using bitcoin ATMs cost Americans nearly $250 million in 2024, more than double the sum from the previous year.

items.title: Trump touts 'momentous breakthrough' on Israel-Hamas ceasefire deal

items.title: WATCH:  Speaker Johnson has emotional exchange with a military mom about shutdown
items.description: A military mom confronted House Speaker Johnson on C-SPAN over the lack of a standalone bill to pay troops if the government shutdown extends beyond O...

items.title: WATCH:  President Trump signs proclamation protecting Columbus Day name
items.description: President Trump signed a proclamation protecting the name Columbus Day before hosting a Cabinet meeting on Thursday.
